dataList.content: This is...
They're crawling out of the pods! The pods that people are trapped in...!
N-no...! This shouldn't be happening...! Why are the Peccatula...!
... Miss Faust.
Speak.
I am certain that you, with your gift of omniscience and brilliance... already hold the knowledge the rest are not privy to.
Yet you have deemed that there must be some things better left unuttered, thus you have not shared with us all that you know.
So allow me to ask first.
As this sight is all too familiar to my eyes.
I wish to hear your opinion on my conjecture, in case that I am found to be incorrect.
This is an experiment on the subject of 'humanity', is it not?

... Faust explains that the purpose of this experiment is to use the energy stored within the Golden Bough to utilize every strand of possibility. It is but one of many experiments made possible using the Golden Bough's powers.
To be more precise, it is... it is an experiment to birth a human...? It is an experiment to create a certain kind of human.
If we were to cast a wider net of possibilities... it can be assumed that this basement is merely an engine room where the power source is activated...
... and that the entire manor itself has become a laboratory of its own.
<... Sometimes, Faust looks like she's pausing to look at something before speaking.>
Does any of this resemble what you've seen before, Yi Sang?
Resemble? Nay... they lie plainly before me.
The machines of my very own design, my very research.
This... is not what I had hoped my research would be used for. Not for such hideous purposes, not to exploit humans... not to 'produce' them...
... You're turning pale.
... The fact that your research is being misused... isn't the only problem, is it?
Oh... is there something that you fear, Yi Sang?
What I fear...
Though parts of these machines are of my design, none of these could have been... Nay, I could not have, not without the assistance from my fellows...
Not without...
Yi Sang falls silent, unable to finish his sentence. He faces forward.
<That man is…>
... You have recognized me long ago, have you not?
Do not stand there in silence; utter aught to me.
What better response is there for you than my utter silence...
... when the customary greetings, words of antagonism, and inquiries about your well-being all feel so inappropriate?
This is no different from how you had always remained a close fellow of silence then... no?
If you can speak so placidly, surrounded betwixt these abominable horrors...
... then you must have always been a part of this.
Aseah.
Well... it was not by my sole volition.
You must already know that I am not one for such grandiose ambition.

dataList.title: Öufi? The Ring?
dataList.content: Hey, you shouldn't reveal yourself just like—!
They are already all aware of who we are. To hurriedly hide in the shadows when the light has already shined upon us is an unsightly cowardice.

dataList.title: Öufi? The Ring?
dataList.content: We are getting tired of playing by your whims. We will make sure that they will hear of everything that has happened—
Oh, 'they'? Interesting, who might this 'they' be? Docents? Or Maestros?
What are you talking about, Ryōshū? They're...
I did say that there was something off about them.
I remember Ryōshū telling the Öufi Association Fixers to stop. That there was something off about them.
Then...
They're not Öufi.
They're nothing but cheap imitations.
Huh?!
